title: OCE Gold+ Ranked 5v5 Team [Obey] Recruiting!
body:
Team Name: Obey

Requirements: Gold+ Solo/Duo Que, preferably all champions for trading purposes, a good knowledge of the game, a serious attitude towards competitive league of legends. 

Roles that Obey is looking for: Obey is looking for all roles, we will have some backup players, but in the main team we're looking for Top, Support and Jungle.

We will mainly be playing on Fridays and Saturdays at 7:00PM AEST. But over the coming weeks due to the Christmas Holidays we will be playing when ever the team is available.

Add me on League (OCE): Nemo

replies.body: plat 5 currently but climbing will be diamond soon i imagine -  am confident in jungle and top working on acquiring all characters as i mained this account to plat 5.
I would love to try out dude! :D
